snippet.title: Shokugeki no Soma OST - Kibo no Uta (Star Glass ver) [Piano Transcription + Sheet]
snippet.description:
*USE HEADPHONE FOR BETTER QUALITY*

Become a Patron to request any OST!
Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/animuffinpiano 

Tutorial Link: https://youtu.be/G19qWBVpLQ8

Hey everyone, AniMuffin desu~~~ I did not realize it's already one week and I thought I will have time to record video and upload on time ._________. Time really flies; I feel old ;___;   Anyway, please don't be mistaken. This is not an arrangement of mine of Shokugeki OP. This is  an acoustic version from the soundtrack. And yes, I did some mistakes again @@ (Don't look at me with that face). Other than that, I think this is a very emotional song and I like the chords very much! It would be better if I record it on grand tho ~ 

Btw I'm watching 3 Gatsu no Lion, and I think I will make a series out of it :D I heard some good piano songs and I'm only at episode 3, meaning there might be more beautiful songs. I should have watched this earlier. I started watching it now because most anime in this season are meh :/

Well I hope you enjoy listening to this OST! If you like this video, please tell your friend, family or anyone to listen to this song. I will appreciate a lot if you do so! Hope you enjoy the sheet and stay tune for the next video.
